email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, with a DWT of 150,000 and an LOA of 280 meters. The laycan is October 15-20. Our starting freight quote is in the low 50s, specifically $50.75 per metric ton. Let me know if this works for you or if you’d like to discuss further. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The laycan works for us, but the freight rate is a bit higher than expected. Would you consider $49.50 per metric ton? Also, could you confirm the vessel’s specifications and any additional terms? Looking forward to your reply. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I can offer $50.00 per metric ton, which is a competitive rate given the current market. The MV Ocean Star is in excellent condition, and I’ve attached the vessel’s specifications for your review. Demurrage is set at $20,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the revised offer. We can agree to $50.00 per metric ton, provided the laycan remains firm at October 15-20. Please confirm the demurrage terms and ensure the vessel is ready for loading on time. Once confirmed, we can proceed with the charter party agreement. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear that $50.00 per metric ton works for you. The laycan is confirmed for October 15-20, and demurrage is $20,000 per day, pro rata. I’ll prepare the charter party agreement and send it over for your review by end of day. Thanks for your cooperation, and let me know if you need anything else. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, sounds good. I’ll review the charter party agreement once received. Looking forward to finalizing this deal. Thanks again for your assistance. Best, John
